title: Entwined
description: “She’s still in there.”It’s been three months since Emily’s demon has awakened inside of her. Months of burning pain, taunting, and most tortuous of all…silence.Emily is forgotten. Or is she?Asher continues to accept his destiny, though he suffers. Gwyn will do anything to protect him, including treachery. And Derek, a demon with no past and only mocking charm as his guise, is planning the biggest coup of all. And he knows exactly how to begin… Macy. A battle of wills, a fight between love and evil and a wish to be noble all intertwine in Book 2 of the Dark Souls Series, but it may come as a surprise to discover what makes a true villain, and who--despite all obstacles--will be the one to fall in love first.DISCLAIMER: As the characters grow into their roles, they will find themselves in more mature situations. Please keep in mind that Entwined includes some profanity, minor sexual situations, and violence.
author: Ketley Allison
